<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer">ScheduleHazardRecognizer</a></>}>
HazardRecognizer - This determines whether or not an instruction can be issued this cycle, and whether or not a noop needs to be inserted to handle the hazard. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// state. Important to restore the state after backtracking. Additionally,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// MaxLookAhead=0 identifies a fake recognizer, allowing the client to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// bypass virtual calls. Currently the PostRA scheduler ignores it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// getHazardType - Return the hazard type of emitting this node.  There are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// three possible results.  Either:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  &#42; NoHazard: it is legal to issue this instruction on this cycle.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  &#42; Hazard: issuing this instruction would stall the machine.  If some</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     other instruction is available, issue it first.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  &#42; NoopHazard: issuing this instruction would break the program.  If</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     some other instruction can be issued, do so, otherwise issue a noop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ae5c28a180502d1923c854952292cf5f6"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#a9bec0e329b12bbc503d08db497d43267">HazardType</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ae5c28a180502d1923c854952292cf5f6">getHazardType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Stalls = 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#a9bec0e329b12bbc503d08db497d43267a4e42ac50bfd060349e49904842121cf1">NoHazard</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// AdvanceCycle - This callback is invoked whenever the next top-down</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction to be scheduled cannot issue in the current cycle, either</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// because of latency or resource conflicts.  This should increment the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// EmitNoop - This callback is invoked when a noop was added to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction stream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ab8cd949a59a859d00c4d0043009d4126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ab8cd949a59a859d00c4d0043009d4126">EmitNoop</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Default implementation: count it as a cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ad54a4120d2dfe3212b807c1f3ad80255">AdvanceCycle</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// EmitNoops - This callback is invoked when noops were added to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction stream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#af15b23b48c3d7e7e7b39b4f204520349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#af15b23b48c3d7e7e7b39b4f204520349">EmitNoops</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Quantity) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Default implementation: count it as a cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; Quantity; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulehazardrecognizer/#ab8cd949a59a859d00c4d0043009d4126">EmitNoop</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
